page.title: 16The Arts in Caerphilly
page.content: {Music There are a variety of organisations in the area, concerned with the Arts. There are a number of {choirs,}mostly 'male voice', though there are some ladies' choirs and some with 'mixed voices'. These choirs and choral societies perform in and outside the area, travelling to other parts of Britain to give concerts. {The Caerphilly Music Club}has existed for thirty years and has had visits from many famous international artists. There are local{Brass Bands}and pupils from schools have their own orchestra and Brass Band and perform publicly.
